printlineSeismogramProcess.template:
Waveforms from the $network.name network owned by $network.owner represented by code $network.code These were recorded at $station.code or $station.name It started recording at $station.start and is located at $station.latitude $station.longitude That could also be represented as $station.orientedLatitude $station.orientedLongitude It is $station.getDistance($event) away from the event, or $station.getDistanceDeg($event) in degrees. The back azimuth is $station.getBaz($event)
The recording channel has code $channel.code It has azimuth $channel.azimuth and dip $channel.dip
The event is in $event.region and had magnitudes $event.allMagnitudes It was at $event.orientedLatitude $event.orientedLongitude $event.depth at $event.timePrecise It came from $event.catalog and was recorded by $event.contributor
We requested #foreach($req in $originalRequest) $req #end
We were told #foreach($req in $availableRequest) $req #end was available
And got #foreach($seis in $seismograms) Seismogram on $channel from $seis.begin to $seis.end #end
